play_store_details.title: Cielo Home
play_store_details.description:
Cielo provides smart climate control solutions for both ducted and ductless HVAC systems. With AI-backed thermostats and intelligent integrated climate control, Cielo is set to revolutionize the HVACR industry by prioritizing energy savings without compromising comfort. Cielo is a customer-centric company. Our prime focus is to maximize comfort and ensure better energy savings for homes and businesses. This has been a major factor in our success, propelling the company to win several accolades, including Inc. 5000, Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500, AHR Expo Innovation Award, and being ranked among America’s Best Home and Garden brands by Newsweek and Statista. At Cielo, we are deeply committed to preserving and conserving our planet for future generations. All our efforts are geared towards achieving this singular objective. Consequently, we have made it our mission to provide energy-saving products that contribute to these efforts. Our range of smart climate control products is designed to do just that – helping create a mindful and better home climate.

Cielo Home App

Cielo Home is FREE, and there are NO monthly subscriptions. Our app is loaded with a huge array of next-gen smart features, carefully designed to add convenience to your life while saving energy. Here’s a glimpse of what you can expect: Global Control: Control your cooling or heating from anywhere in the world. 7-Day Scheduling: Set daily or weekly schedules to run your air conditioning based on your routine. Energy Savings: Keep an eye on your usage patterns and find opportunities to save energy. Eco-Friendly HVAC (Integrated Controls): Reduce reliance on fossil fuel-based heating systems by auto-switching between your residential HVAC systems using Cielo Linked. Maximize Comfort: Enjoy the ease of Presets & intelligent triggers to regulate your home temperature. Zone Control: Group multiple Cielo smart thermostats into a zone for personalized temperature control and manage all of them with a simple tap. Geofencing: Set location-based actions and controls to maximize savings and comfort. Compatibility: Cielo ductless smart products are compatible with any ductless air conditioner or heat pump that has an IR remote controller. Our ducted controls include smart thermostats, which support central HVAC systems, providing a comprehensive solution for all your climate control needs. At Cielo, we are committed to enhancing your home comfort and energy efficiency. Join our many satisfied customers who enjoy the convenience and savings brought by Cielo’s smart climate control solutions

play_store_details.title: luna viewer
play_store_details.description:
Expand the functionality of your lunaIP and lunaHD products:
Remote access to recorders, video surveillance cameras, door stations - all at a glance with the luna app

Main functions:
- Live access to cameras and door stations with picture and sound
Device management and control (e.g., PTZ, zoom, focus, and on-device setup)

play_store_details.title: Blink Home Monitor
play_store_details.description:
Blink’s affordable smart home security cameras and systems help you monitor your home directly from your smartphone. With multi-system support and simple setup, you can easily control multiple Blink cameras within one app. The Blink Home Monitor app will alert you to what matters, day or night, no matter where you are. Just Blink and you’re home. 

Be there from anywhere with Blink smart home security cameras

The new battery-powered smart home security cameras from Blink and Amazon go where wires can’t! Outdoor and Indoor run for up to two years on the included set of AA lithium batteries to help protect what matters most for less. Looking for an affordable plug-in option? Blink Mini has you covered!

Blink Outdoor: weathers the storm so you don’t have to. Outdoor runs for up to two years* on a single set of AA batteries to help you protect your home inside and out — rain or shine — with features like two-way audio, motion detection, and more. Outdoor works with Alexa.

Blink Indoor: is a wireless, battery-powered security camera that you can place anywhere inside your home. Features like two-way audio and night vision help you stay connected to what’s happening no matter where you are — day or night. Indoor works with Alexa.

Blink Mini: is mighty — but tiny — which means you can plug it in anywhere inside your home. Starting at $34.99 Mini is a great first step towards keeping your home more secure. Hear, see, and speak right from the Blink Home Monitor app on your phone and get alerts whenever motion is detected.

Works with Alexa

Connect Blink Outdoor, Indoor, or Mini to select Alexa-enabled devices for voice commands at home. You can use your voice to stream live video, play recorded clips, arm and disarm your camera, be alerted to motion, and more. 
Go hands-free with Alexa!

Enhance Your Smart Home Security

Use the Blink Home Monitor app to check in on what’s happening at home from anywhere at any time. The app connects your home to your phone in HD video so you can see and protect what matters most. With multi-system support, you can use Blink to watch your home, vacation home, or business all at the same time.

play_store_details.title: Ring - Always Home
play_store_details.description:
Watch over your property from anywhere with Ring Video Doorbells, Security Cameras and Alarm systems, and Smart Lights. Ring Doorbells and Cameras can send you instant alerts when someone’s at your door or motion is detected. Keep an eye on what matters with live HD video and greet visitors with Two-Way Talk. With a compatible Ring Protect Plan subscription (or free trial), you can review, save, and share Ring videos.

Ring Smart Lights let you control and schedule lighting easily. Some models can even notify you about motion nearby, and trigger other compatible Ring devices to record.

Ring Alarm systems let you monitor entrances and indoor spaces, and detect certain safety hazards. Enroll in Ring Alarm professional monitoring
(compatible Ring Protect Plan subscription required) to request dispatch of emergency responders when your Ring Alarm is triggered.

Whether you’re halfway around the world or just busy with the kids upstairs, with Ring, you’re always home. 

What you can do with the Ring app:

- Get real-time doorbell and motion alerts on your smartphone or tablet
- See and speak with visitors with HD Video and Two-Way Talk
- Arm and disarm your Ring system

play_store_details.title: hiseeu camera guide
play_store_details.description:
Welcome to the hiseeu camera guide app. 

Do you know what are the advantages of hiseeu camera guide? Do you know the differences between a hiseeu camera guide? How does hiseeu camera guide work in coordination with your phone?! 

In hiseeu camera guide app, you will find everything you want and need to know about your hiseeu camera guide. And to know the details, and how to connect the hiseeu camera guide to your phone, Here at hiseeu camera guide application, we have collected information that will really help you with that.


• 【2K & Auto Tracking】hiseeu camera FJ2C adopts 3 megapixel level high sensitivity CMOS with a resolution of 2304by1296, which is 50% higher than the traditional 1080p pixel camera. The improvement of pixels not only improves the definition, but also enables you to get the world you have never seen before on the 1080p camera. Relying on 2K high-resolution pixels, hiseeu camera enables the motion detection function to track moving objects most accurately.

• 【Two Way Audio & Compatible with hiseeu camera System】Installed the Eseecloud App, connect the hiseeu camera to 2.4GHz WiFi. Use the Two Way Audio function to talk with your baby in front of the hiseeu camera. FJ2C is also compatible with the hiseeu camera system.

• 【SD Storage Supported & Auto Night Version】The hiseeu camera built-in high-sensitivity light sensor enables the hiseeu camera to detect the surrounding light. Once the light around the hiseeu camera becomes dim, Night vision mode will automatically turn on, providing you with 24 / 7 uninterrupted security. As long as you set the motion record on the Eseecloud app, Then the recordings files will be stored in micro SD card.

• 【Pan 355° Tilt 90° & Preset Frequently Viewed Locations】Two built-in brushless DC motors make the hiseeu camera rotate 355 ° horizontally and 90 ° up and down. You can also set preset position on your mobile phone, which is convenient for you to call pictures in different positions. The adjustable hiseeu camera speed makes the auto tracking function more accurate. Support setup video screen reverse function on Eseecloud App, you can install the hiseeu camera upside down on the ceiling.

• 【PC & Mobile Remote Viewing & Push Notification】hiseeu camera FJ2C allows you to view the live video remotely and receive alarm message by EseeCloud App, You can install it from Google play. You can also install Eseecloud software on your PC. Login with same account after that The device information will be automatically synchronized without resetting on PC.


Features of hiseeu camera guide app:-
+ Contains many pictures to see all designs of hiseeu camera guide .
+ Easy, clear and uncomplicated hiseeu camera guide .
+ Weekly updates hiseeu camera guide app.
+ hiseeu camera guide app beautiful appearance, decent and comfortable to the eye.
+ free hiseeu camera guide app.
+ This hiseeu camera guide app rich in information and pictures.

- hiseeu camera guide Features & Details
- hiseeu camera guide Description
- hiseeu camera guide Photos
- hiseeu camera guide Customer Questions
- hiseeu camera guide User Manual
- hiseeu camera guide Other Related Items 

At the end, we hope you have a great day within hiseeu camera guide app.

play_store_details.title: Defender Guard
play_store_details.description:
At Defender, your peace of mind is our top priority, and we design our products to provide the greatest value to our customers with easy-to-use, simple, and robust security solutions. 

Control your Defender Guard camera with this app to unlock a world of possibilities. Set motion detection schedules, instant alerts and notifications, record and retrieve footage, share and save memorable and not-so-memorable moments, and customize a whole array of other features to your liking. Stay connected anywhere, anytime with advanced encrypted communication protocols. You can even stream, hear, and save live footage over a cellular data connection. 

Cloud Storage – No more fees, subscription services, or monthly liabilities. Use your Defender Guard camera with an optional 128 GB SD card (not included) and you’ll get days of recording (depending on your settings). 

Motion Detection – Detect everything, anytime. With advanced Night Vision sensors, your Defender Guard can send you motion alerts the day or night, during set times, or only when you access the app. 

Activity Regions - Set a detection region and say goodbye to false alarms. Keep an eye out on only the areas that matter!

Recording Timeline – With an easy-to-use visual timeline, scroll through past recordings with an intuitive time/date slider. It’s simplicity, but visualized!

Defender Guard and this app work best on a high-speed broadband network with a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi connection. A 5 GHz connection is not supported.

play_store_details.title: EZVIZ
play_store_details.description:
EZVIZ – Security Video For Smart Life

The EZVIZ app is designed to work with our series of Security Cameras and other Smart Home products. By using this app, it is so easy to manage your camera and other smart home devices remotely from across the globe any time. 

You can get full access and remote control of all devices functions at fingertips, and take necessary actions to ensure the safety of your homes, businesses and loved ones when receiving immediate motion detection alerts on your phone.

Key features:
- View high-definition live stream from anywhere
- See in the dark with IR light on
 - Playback recorded videos with CloudPlay or an SD card
- Talk via Two-Way Audio 
- Get instant alerts when motion is detected
- Customize detection zones and sensitivity 
- Set schedules to record the moments that matter 
- Share devices with friends and family

•	Enjoy professional-grade features

play_store_details.title: Obsbot Start
play_store_details.description:
Start your moment and explore the futuristic live stream using Obsbot Start with OBSBOT Cameras.

Mastermind Your OBSBOT Camera
Obsbot Start is an exclusive application designed for OBSBOT camera. With its easy-to-use interface and powerful features. Your Tail Air livestreaming experience can be significantly improved with minimal effort.

Unleash AI Capabilities
Collocating with built-in AI features in OBSBOT Tail Air, Obsbot start can maximize the hidden underlying power of the device and makes the AI features controllable smoothly and conveniently.

Start Livestreaming Anywhere
Obsbot Start offers internal support for the most popular social livestream platforms. Preset the social accounts, and the livestream signal could instantly starts and be on air within the blinks, with only a tap.

Manage Every Moment Intelligently
This feature uses the OBSBOT AI algorithm to automatically divide captured video into different grids in real-time. By clicking on the grid you want, you can quickly and accurately manage your livestream image and push the video signal on air.

Customize Parameters Anytime
Say goodbye to immutable image settings. With Obsbot Start, you can customize image parameters whether you're on Air or not, and apply them instantaneously whenever you need.

OBSBOT hopes to take you to enjoy the fun of video shooting and livestreaming in a simpler and more energetic way, record and share your life moments on air with dynamic video language and limitless imagination.
If you have any suggestions in the process of using OBSBOT, please feel free to write to service@obsbot.com. We value every communication with you.

play_store_details.title: SUNBA Camera Guide
play_store_details.description:
SUNBA Camera Guide APP Features:

Weekly updates for the SUNBA camera guide app.
Pleasant appearance of the SUNBA camera guide app, comfortable to the eye.
Contains numerous pictures showcasing all designs of the SUNBA camera guide.
The SUNBA camera guide app is free.
Rich in information and pictures, the SUNBA camera guide app hopes to enhance your experience.

Within the content of the SUNBA camera guide app:

SUNBA Camera Guide Features & Details
Description of the SUNBA Camera Guide
Photos in the SUNBA Camera Guide
Customer Questions about the SUNBA Camera Guide
User Manual for the SUNBA Camera Guide
Other Related Items in the SUNBA Camera Guide
In the SUNBA camera guide app, you'll discover everything you need to know about your SUNBA camera guide. To understand the specifics and how to connect the SUNBA camera guide to your phone, we've compiled information within the SUNBA camera guide app that will truly assist you.


[Outdoor PTZ Camera for Home & Small Business] – Compact size 4-inch long range IP camera. Automatic outdoor day/night switch with IR-Cut infrared night vision up to 328ft with its 20x robust optical zoom capacity. In addition, the camera has IEC 60825-1 certified on its laser infrared LED to meet US safety standard.

[PoE+ Convenient Wiring] - Running one Ethernet cable to deliver both network and power signal with 802.3at (aka.,PoE+ at least 25W single port) adapter. Audio interface. H.265 HEVC with reduced bandwidth and storage taken (on Blue Iris, VMS Client or Sunba H.265 NVR only). Backwardly compatible with H.264 supported software/NVR.

[4K Remote Live View] - 4K ultra HD resolution, 1/2.8"Sensor, Smartphone (iOS/Android) P2P remote viewing & motion alert, Web access (Chrome, Internet Explorer), Desktop access (complimentary VMS client for PC & Mac users).

[20X Optical Zoom & Fast Speed PTZ] – Outdoor IP66 rated aluminum fast speed PTZ Dome with PTZ speed up to 90 degrees/s. It can perform 360 degrees rotation and can tilt 90 degrees downward and have additional 5 degrees upward (against conventional dome cameras). The 20X optical zoom (2.8~55.4 degrees viewing angle) can deliver details hundreds feet away.

[2-Yr Warranty & Compliant] – You are covered! 30 days return & 2-Yr US manufacturer's warranty. Blue Iris (SUNBA: H.264/H.265 34567), QNAP and Security Spy compatible.Content of SUNBA camera guide app :-


- SUNBA camera guide Features & Details
- SUNBA camera guide Description
- SUNBA camera guide Photos
- SUNBA camera guide Customer Questions
- SUNBA camera guide User Manual
- SUNBA camera guide Other Related Items

Wishing you a great day within the SUNBA camera guide app!

play_store_details.title: Blink Home Monitor
play_store_details.description:
Blink’s affordable smart home security cameras and systems help you monitor your home directly from your smartphone. With multi-system support and simple setup, you can easily control multiple Blink cameras within one app. The Blink Home Monitor app will alert you to what matters, day or night, no matter where you are. Just Blink and you’re home. 

Be there from anywhere with Blink smart home security cameras

The new battery-powered smart home security cameras from Blink and Amazon go where wires can’t! Outdoor and Indoor run for up to two years on the included set of AA lithium batteries to help protect what matters most for less. Looking for an affordable plug-in option? Blink Mini has you covered!

Blink Outdoor: weathers the storm so you don’t have to. Outdoor runs for up to two years* on a single set of AA batteries to help you protect your home inside and out — rain or shine — with features like two-way audio, motion detection, and more. Outdoor works with Alexa.

Blink Indoor: is a wireless, battery-powered security camera that you can place anywhere inside your home. Features like two-way audio and night vision help you stay connected to what’s happening no matter where you are — day or night. Indoor works with Alexa.

Blink Mini: is mighty — but tiny — which means you can plug it in anywhere inside your home. Starting at $34.99 Mini is a great first step towards keeping your home more secure. Hear, see, and speak right from the Blink Home Monitor app on your phone and get alerts whenever motion is detected.

Works with Alexa

Connect Blink Outdoor, Indoor, or Mini to select Alexa-enabled devices for voice commands at home. You can use your voice to stream live video, play recorded clips, arm and disarm your camera, be alerted to motion, and more. 
Go hands-free with Alexa!

Enhance Your Smart Home Security

Use the Blink Home Monitor app to check in on what’s happening at home from anywhere at any time. The app connects your home to your phone in HD video so you can see and protect what matters most. With multi-system support, you can use Blink to watch your home, vacation home, or business all at the same time.

play_store_details.title: Zosi Smart
play_store_details.description:
Zosi Smart: Live NVR/DVR/IPC viewing on your mobile phone
Zosi Smart supports the following features: 
Configure many settings from your handset or tablet
Multi-channel viewing  on screen at the same time 
Play back stored recordings from your DVR/NVR/IPC on your handset or tablet (requires high upload speed internet) 
Capture video from your camera live view to your Phone to play back later 
Capture single and multi still images and save these to your Phone's picture library 
Control PTZ (pan, tilt, zoom) cameras remotely

play_store_details.title: Annke Vision
play_store_details.description:
The Annke Vision app is designed to work with ANNKE DNRs, NVRs and IP cameras which support Cloud P2P function.It allows you to live with your cameras remotely.All you need to do is creating an account and adding device into the account, then you can enjoy the real-time video from cameras on a global scale. it also allows you to play back recorded video to search every milestone of your life.When motion detection alarm of your device triggered, you can get an instant message notification from Annke Vision app.
Key Features:
1. Real-time monitoring
2. Video playback
3. Motion detection alarm notification


Contact Us
Help center : help.annke.com

play_store_details.title: Reolink
play_store_details.description:
Reolink App is an easy-to-use security camera system surveillance app. It enables you to locally or remotely access your IP cameras and NVRs on mobile devices. You can monitor and watch live streaming of your home and business anywhere and anytime. It helps you easily get peace of mind.

Key Features:
1.	Only 3 steps to access cameras and NVRs (at the same local network) --- the easiest solution ever.
2.	Easy and friendly interface for all users to use.
3.	Remotely monitor and watch live streaming via 3G/4G or WiFi anywhere and anytime.
4.	Multi-channel viewing (up to 16 channels) on screen at the same time.
5.	Remotely playback video recording from your camera SD card and NVR HDD.
6.	Capture video from live view channels on your mobile device to playback.
7.	Capture single and multiple images to save on your mobile device.
8.	Get emails or push notifications in real time when motion detection is triggered.
9.	Schedule video recording (including motion-triggered recording) at anytime.
10.	Control PTZ (pan-tilt-zoom) cameras remotely (left, right, up and down).

Note: Reolink App is compatible with NVRs and IP Cams from Reolink.

More Supports:
Website: https://reolink.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ReolinkTech
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ReolinkTech
Contact: https://reolink.com/contact-us/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEHKZX6fFVtWd4tnnRkzrMA

play_store_details.title: hiseeu camera guide
play_store_details.description:
Welcome to the hiseeu camera guide app. 

Do you know what are the advantages of hiseeu camera guide? Do you know the differences between a hiseeu camera guide? How does hiseeu camera guide work in coordination with your phone?! 

In hiseeu camera guide app, you will find everything you want and need to know about your hiseeu camera guide. And to know the details, and how to connect the hiseeu camera guide to your phone, Here at hiseeu camera guide application, we have collected information that will really help you with that.


• 【2K & Auto Tracking】hiseeu camera FJ2C adopts 3 megapixel level high sensitivity CMOS with a resolution of 2304by1296, which is 50% higher than the traditional 1080p pixel camera. The improvement of pixels not only improves the definition, but also enables you to get the world you have never seen before on the 1080p camera. Relying on 2K high-resolution pixels, hiseeu camera enables the motion detection function to track moving objects most accurately.

• 【Two Way Audio & Compatible with hiseeu camera System】Installed the Eseecloud App, connect the hiseeu camera to 2.4GHz WiFi. Use the Two Way Audio function to talk with your baby in front of the hiseeu camera. FJ2C is also compatible with the hiseeu camera system.

• 【SD Storage Supported & Auto Night Version】The hiseeu camera built-in high-sensitivity light sensor enables the hiseeu camera to detect the surrounding light. Once the light around the hiseeu camera becomes dim, Night vision mode will automatically turn on, providing you with 24 / 7 uninterrupted security. As long as you set the motion record on the Eseecloud app, Then the recordings files will be stored in micro SD card.

• 【Pan 355° Tilt 90° & Preset Frequently Viewed Locations】Two built-in brushless DC motors make the hiseeu camera rotate 355 ° horizontally and 90 ° up and down. You can also set preset position on your mobile phone, which is convenient for you to call pictures in different positions. The adjustable hiseeu camera speed makes the auto tracking function more accurate. Support setup video screen reverse function on Eseecloud App, you can install the hiseeu camera upside down on the ceiling.

• 【PC & Mobile Remote Viewing & Push Notification】hiseeu camera FJ2C allows you to view the live video remotely and receive alarm message by EseeCloud App, You can install it from Google play. You can also install Eseecloud software on your PC. Login with same account after that The device information will be automatically synchronized without resetting on PC.


Features of hiseeu camera guide app:-
+ Contains many pictures to see all designs of hiseeu camera guide .
+ Easy, clear and uncomplicated hiseeu camera guide .
+ Weekly updates hiseeu camera guide app.
+ hiseeu camera guide app beautiful appearance, decent and comfortable to the eye.
+ free hiseeu camera guide app.
+ This hiseeu camera guide app rich in information and pictures.


Content of hiseeu camera guide app :-
- hiseeu camera guide Features & Details
- hiseeu camera guide Description
- hiseeu camera guide Photos
- hiseeu camera guide Customer Questions
- hiseeu camera guide User Manual
- hiseeu camera guide Other Related Items 

At the end, we hope you have a great day within hiseeu camera guide app.

play_store_details.title: Defender Guard
play_store_details.description:
At Defender, your peace of mind is our top priority, and we design our products to provide the greatest value to our customers with easy-to-use, simple, and robust security solutions. 

Control your Defender Guard camera with this app to unlock a world of possibilities. Set motion detection schedules, instant alerts and notifications, record and retrieve footage, share and save memorable and not-so-memorable moments, and customize a whole array of other features to your liking. Stay connected anywhere, anytime with advanced encrypted communication protocols. You can even stream, hear, and save live footage over a cellular data connection. 

Cloud Storage – No more fees, subscription services, or monthly liabilities. Use your Defender Guard camera with an optional 128 GB SD card (not included) and you’ll get days of recording (depending on your settings). 

Motion Detection – Detect everything, anytime. With advanced Night Vision sensors, your Defender Guard can send you motion alerts the day or night, during set times, or only when you access the app. 

Activity Regions - Set a detection region and say goodbye to false alarms. Keep an eye out on only the areas that matter!

Recording Timeline – With an easy-to-use visual timeline, scroll through past recordings with an intuitive time/date slider. It’s simplicity, but visualized!

Defender Guard and this app work best on a high-speed broadband network with a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi connection. A 5 GHz connection is not supported.

Recording Timeline – With an easy-to-use visual timeline, scroll through past recordings with an intuitive time/date slider. It’s simplicity, but visualized!

Defender Guard and this app work best on a high-speed broadband network with a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi connection. A 5 GHz connection is not supported.

play_store_details.title: hiseeu camera guide
play_store_details.description:
Welcome to the hiseeu camera guide app. 

Do you know what are the advantages of hiseeu camera guide? Do you know the differences between a hiseeu camera guide? How does hiseeu camera guide work in coordination with your phone?! 

In hiseeu camera guide app, you will find everything you want and need to know about your hiseeu camera guide. And to know the details, and how to connect the hiseeu camera guide to your phone, Here at hiseeu camera guide application, we have collected information that will really help you with that.


• 【2K & Auto Tracking】hiseeu camera FJ2C adopts 3 megapixel level high sensitivity CMOS with a resolution of 2304by1296, which is 50% higher than the traditional 1080p pixel camera. The improvement of pixels not only improves the definition, but also enables you to get the world you have never seen before on the 1080p camera. Relying on 2K high-resolution pixels, hiseeu camera enables the motion detection function to track moving objects most accurately.

• 【Two Way Audio & Compatible with hiseeu camera System】Installed the Eseecloud App, connect the hiseeu camera to 2.4GHz WiFi. Use the Two Way Audio function to talk with your baby in front of the hiseeu camera. FJ2C is also compatible with the hiseeu camera system.

• 【SD Storage Supported & Auto Night Version】The hiseeu camera built-in high-sensitivity light sensor enables the hiseeu camera to detect the surrounding light. Once the light around the hiseeu camera becomes dim, Night vision mode will automatically turn on, providing you with 24 / 7 uninterrupted security. As long as you set the motion record on the Eseecloud app, Then the recordings files will be stored in micro SD card.

• 【Pan 355° Tilt 90° & Preset Frequently Viewed Locations】Two built-in brushless DC motors make the hiseeu camera rotate 355 ° horizontally and 90 ° up and down. You can also set preset position on your mobile phone, which is convenient for you to call pictures in different positions. The adjustable hiseeu camera speed makes the auto tracking function more accurate. Support setup video screen reverse function on Eseecloud App, you can install the hiseeu camera upside down on the ceiling.

• 【PC & Mobile Remote Viewing & Push Notification】hiseeu camera FJ2C allows you to view the live video remotely and receive alarm message by EseeCloud App, You can install it from Google play. You can also install Eseecloud software on your PC. Login with same account after that The device information will be automatically synchronized without resetting on PC.

+ Contains many pictures to see all designs of hiseeu camera guide .
+ Easy, clear and uncomplicated hiseeu camera guide .
+ Weekly updates hiseeu camera guide app.
+ hiseeu camera guide app beautiful appearance, decent and comfortable to the eye.
+ free hiseeu camera guide app.
+ This hiseeu camera guide app rich in information and pictures.

play_store_details.title: Reolink
play_store_details.description:
Reolink App is an easy-to-use security camera system surveillance app. It enables you to locally or remotely access your IP cameras and NVRs on mobile devices. You can monitor and watch live streaming of your home and business anywhere and anytime. It helps you easily get peace of mind.

Key Features:
1.	Only 3 steps to access cameras and NVRs (at the same local network) --- the easiest solution ever.
2.	Easy and friendly interface for all users to use.
3.	Remotely monitor and watch live streaming via 3G/4G or WiFi anywhere and anytime.
4.	Multi-channel viewing (up to 16 channels) on screen at the same time.
5.	Remotely playback video recording from your camera SD card and NVR HDD.
6.	Capture video from live view channels on your mobile device to playback.
7.	Capture single and multiple images to save on your mobile device.
8.	Get emails or push notifications in real time when motion detection is triggered.
9.	Schedule video recording (including motion-triggered recording) at anytime.
10.	Control PTZ (pan-tilt-zoom) cameras remotely (left, right, up and down).

Note: Reolink App is compatible with NVRs and IP Cams from Reolink.

More Supports:
Website: https://reolink.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ReolinkTech
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ReolinkTech
Contact: https://reolink.com/contact-us/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEHKZX6fFVtWd4tnnRkzrMA

play_store_details.title: HD Camera for Android
play_store_details.description:
This is an native android system camera app. HD Camera utilized all advantage of your phone or tablet. Let you snaps quick and easy photos and videos.

Key features:
- camera and video features
- 3 modes: camera, video recorder & panorama
- Pinch to zoom
- smart panorama shooting 
- Countdown Timer
- Dynamic user interface (phone/tablet)
- Wide screen pictures
- Picture quality setting
- White balance settings(Incandescent, Fluorescent, Auto, Daylight,Cloudy)
- Screen mode settings(Action, Night, Sunset, Play)
- Exposure
- Location targeting
- Configurable volume keys
- Photo Callage 
- Photo crop and photo editing.

Although in the current market, there are have many kinds of camera applications, but we still think this android native application is the most efficient and able to meet a user needs. Here only as a supplement for those devices are not installed android native system provides an additional option. 

Notes:
The special permissions for use
1, android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
HD Camera can remember your photos and videos location if you wish. Other apps can access this information along with your saved images.

2, android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
After you take a photo,  you can share with others. HD Camera need to read the contacts information and help you share photos via email, SMS, or other apps.

------------------
Disclaimer：
This app is based on native android camera code, and licensed under the Apache License.
code: https://github.com/CyanogenMod/android_packages_apps_Camera2
Apache Licens: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html

play_store_details.description: V360 pro is a special monitoring software for network cameras that can be broadcast and used. It can watch clear and smooth real-time pictures at any time after connecting smart cameras through mobile phones. It supports functions such as two-way voice, remote PTZ control, video playback, motion detection and alarm push. It is suitable for families, shops and companies, caring for the elderly, children and pets, supervising nannies and employees, and intelligent anti-theft.

play_store_details.title: CareCam
play_store_details.description:
CARE CAM - the one that knows you best.
Remote Video Monitoring: Always stay closer to your family.
Motion Detection:              Protect your family 24/7.
HD Video Playback:           Do not let you miss any event.

KEY FEATURES:
HD Live Streaming 
- Keep images clear after zooming in and videos smooth.
  Let you see every detail.

Two-Way Audio
- You are able to talk to your family anywhere instantly 
   with one tap.

Motion Alerts
- With the activity timeline and snapshots, you can see at a glance 
  when events happened.

Home/Away Assist
- Let you control your camera and its accessories in one click by configuring  
  the On/Off state of the devices in Home and Away mode.

Camera Sharing
- Share the camera access to your family in a secure and controllable way.
  And you can cancel sharing at any time.

Video History
- When motion is triggered, videos will be recorded to the SD card, and Care   
  Cloud at the same time. You can scan through the entire video history to see what you missed. (Cloud Recording sold separately.)

Extended Accessory
- Support various accessories such as “contact”, “motion”, and “smoke”  
   sensor, more comprehensive protection of your safety.

play_store_details.title: Reolink
play_store_details.description:
Reolink App is an easy-to-use security camera system surveillance app. It enables you to locally or remotely access your IP cameras and NVRs on mobile devices. You can monitor and watch live streaming of your home and business anywhere and anytime. It helps you easily get peace of mind.

Key Features:
1.	Only 3 steps to access cameras and NVRs (at the same local network) --- the easiest solution ever.
2.	Easy and friendly interface for all users to use.
3.	Remotely monitor and watch live streaming via 3G/4G or WiFi anywhere and anytime.
4.	Multi-channel viewing (up to 16 channels) on screen at the same time.
5.	Remotely playback video recording from your camera SD card and NVR HDD.
6.	Capture video from live view channels on your mobile device to playback.
7.	Capture single and multiple images to save on your mobile device.
8.	Get emails or push notifications in real time when motion detection is triggered.
9.	Schedule video recording (including motion-triggered recording) at anytime.
10.	Control PTZ (pan-tilt-zoom) cameras remotely (left, right, up and down).

Note: Reolink App is compatible with NVRs and IP Cams from Reolink.

More Supports:
Website: https://reolink.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ReolinkTech
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ReolinkTech
Contact: https://reolink.com/contact-us/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEHKZX6fFVtWd4tnnRkzrMA

play_store_details.title: hiseeu camera guide
play_store_details.description:
Welcome to the hiseeu camera guide app. 

Do you know what are the advantages of hiseeu camera guide? Do you know the differences between a hiseeu camera guide? How does hiseeu camera guide work in coordination with your phone?! 

In hiseeu camera guide app, you will find everything you want and need to know about your hiseeu camera guide. And to know the details, and how to connect the hiseeu camera guide to your phone, Here at hiseeu camera guide application, we have collected information that will really help you with that.


• 【2K & Auto Tracking】hiseeu camera FJ2C adopts 3 megapixel level high sensitivity CMOS with a resolution of 2304by1296, which is 50% higher than the traditional 1080p pixel camera. The improvement of pixels not only improves the definition, but also enables you to get the world you have never seen before on the 1080p camera. Relying on 2K high-resolution pixels, hiseeu camera enables the motion detection function to track moving objects most accurately.

• 【Two Way Audio & Compatible with hiseeu camera System】Installed the Eseecloud App, connect the hiseeu camera to 2.4GHz WiFi. Use the Two Way Audio function to talk with your baby in front of the hiseeu camera. FJ2C is also compatible with the hiseeu camera system.

• 【SD Storage Supported & Auto Night Version】The hiseeu camera built-in high-sensitivity light sensor enables the hiseeu camera to detect the surrounding light. Once the light around the hiseeu camera becomes dim, Night vision mode will automatically turn on, providing you with 24 / 7 uninterrupted security. As long as you set the motion record on the Eseecloud app, Then the recordings files will be stored in micro SD card.

• 【Pan 355° Tilt 90° & Preset Frequently Viewed Locations】Two built-in brushless DC motors make the hiseeu camera rotate 355 ° horizontally and 90 ° up and down. You can also set preset position on your mobile phone, which is convenient for you to call pictures in different positions. The adjustable hiseeu camera speed makes the auto tracking function more accurate. Support setup video screen reverse function on Eseecloud App, you can install the hiseeu camera upside down on the ceiling.

• 【PC & Mobile Remote Viewing & Push Notification】hiseeu camera FJ2C allows you to view the live video remotely and receive alarm message by EseeCloud App, You can install it from Google play. You can also install Eseecloud software on your PC. Login with same account after that The device information will be automatically synchronized without resetting on PC.

+ Contains many pictures to see all designs of hiseeu camera guide .
+ Easy, clear and uncomplicated hiseeu camera guide .
+ Weekly updates hiseeu camera guide app.
+ hiseeu camera guide app beautiful appearance, decent and comfortable to the eye.

+ This hiseeu camera guide app rich in information and pictures.

At the end, we hope you have a great day within hiseeu camera guide app.

play_store_details.title: LOCKLY®
play_store_details.description:
Enjoy the safe and keyless experience of your smart home now. Lock, unlock and monitor your door status by using your phones within Bluetooth range. Give keyless entry to your family members, friends, renters or visitors. 
The LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock App helps you control and share access to your home’s LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock.
With LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock app, you will never worry about key being stolen or lost.

Main Features:
• Unlock your LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock with our iOS and Android compatible app securely through Bluetooth; 
• Manage up to 8 sets (6 to 8 digits each) guests’ codes with expiring date for each of your LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock;
• Set up temperate access code anywhere in the world;
• Share codes with friends or guests via email, whatsapp or text;
• Configure the built-in alarm to beep when the door senses a slight disturbance such as opening and closing, or sound a loud alarm when a forced entry attempt is detected
• Access your history of Smart Lock to keep tracking the entry history
• View battery status and receive low battery notifications.
• Manage multiple homes with one App


Buy LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock now!

Official Website: www.lockly.com
Contact us: help@lockly.com

play_store_details.title: SECURAM Guard
play_store_details.description:
The SECURAM Guard smart home app is the security central command in the palm of your hand. The app guides you through installation and setup of all the SECURAM smart devices including the SECURAM EOS - Wi-Fi fingerprint deadbolt. The app is well designed and very intuitive, making use very easy. Stay connected to your home and valuables with the SECURAM Guard app.

App features:

SECURAM EOS - Wi-Fi fingerprint deadbolt:
- unlock/lock deadbolt remotely 
- view history 
- add and delete users 
- change code 
- create One Time Access codes 
- create temporary / date-based codes 
- receive alerts and notifications

SECURAM Touch - smart fingerprint deadbolt: 
- unlock/lock deadbolt remotely
- view history
- add and delete users
- change code
- create One Time Access codes
- receive alerts and notifications

Window/Door sensors:
- view status in real time
- view history

Smart Safe Locks: 
- unlock remotely
- issue One Time Access codes
- view history
- add and delete users

Safe Monitor:
- monitor temperature and humidity conditions
- set vibration sensitivity
- door status via optical or laser sensor
- view history

More smart products coming soon...

Welcome to Wonder Family, your app for exploring our wide range of products, and accessing exclusive offers, product guides, and wellness & beauty articles, written by our experts to enhance your everyday life.

From extensive user instructions to a wealth of additional resources, we’ve got everything you need to make the most out of your products.
What you can expect:

Seamless Browsing Experience: Navigate through our thoughtfully categorized product listings for an effortless and enjoyable shopping journey.

Comprehensive Product Guides: Discover user-friendly instructions, guaranteeing that you know your product like the back of your hand.

Valuable Resources and More: Beyond products, dive into a variety of lifestyle tips, guides, and articles aimed at enriching your daily life. Discover new ways to enhance your well-being, optimize your living space, and more.

Never Miss an Update: Stay in the loop with the latest product releases, exclusive offers, and a constant stream of fresh content, all curated for you.


Wonder Family is also home to an assortment of goods that exceed standard marketplace offerings:

Health and Lifestyle: From fitness ideas to wellness tips, explore content and products that elevate your living experience.

Celebrations and Gifts: Find the perfect gifts and party essentials, accompanied by tips and tricks to make every occasion memorable.

Everyday Essentials and More: Discover a wide range of products, from the daily necessities to the unique and extraordinary.

At Wonder Family, our mission is to provide a transparent, enriching platform for exploring products, gaining knowledge, and connecting with a like-minded community.

play_store_details.title: Aqara Home
play_store_details.descriptionHTML:
Aqara Home is an app for smart home automation and control. With Aqara Home, you can:
1. control Aqara accessories anywhere and anytime where there is Internet access;
2. create homes and rooms and assign accessories to the rooms;
3. control your Aqara accessories and check the status of connected appliances. For example:
• adjust the brightness of lights and check the power consumption of home appliances;
• monitor the temperature, humidity and air pressure;
• detect water leak, and human movement.
4. create Automations to automate your home. For example:
• set a timer to turn on or off an appliance connected to a smart plug;
• use a Door and Window Sensor to trigger lights: turn on lights automatically when the door opens.
5. create Scenes to control multiple accessories. For example, add a Scene to turn on multiple lights and fans;
Aqara Home app supports following Aqara accessories: Aqara Hub, Smart Plug, Wireless Remote Switch, LED Light Bulb, Door and Window Sensor, Motion Sensor, Temperature and Humidity Sensor, Vibration Sensor, and Water Leak Sensor. This is not a complete list. Please see www.aqara.com for more details.

play_store_details.title: Smart Lock (App/Photo)
play_store_details.description:
Smart Lock provides your privacy in mobile phone from others.
You can meet here the most essential App which hides Apps/Pictures/Media Files by managing password.
Do you mind somebody executing Apps or taking a look to pictures and media files on your mobile phone?
Smart Lock provides you lots of features such as locking App, staying awake and locking auto screen-rotate.
No one can see locked Apps/Pictures/Media Files!!!

Main Features :
- Locking App
- Locking each Picture/Media File
- Staying awake (Executing locked App)
- Locking auto screen-rotate (Executing locked App)
- Change notification of mobile phone number
- Screen Lock Type : PINs, Password, Pattern, Fingerprint
- Supported GIF(Animated)
- Can use ad-free App. for a while through playing the reward ads.

[ Tip ]
- Be careful when deleting unlocked media files. If you do that, you will lost media files. Steps to recover it : Smart Lock Reinstall > Setting > Lock Media Recovery
- If you delete ".SmartLock" folder in SDcard, locked files will be deleted.
- If you choose "Clear data" menu(path : Settings > Applications manager > Smart Lock (Free)), information of locked files will be deleted.
- App which has function like cleaning up storage(ex. Clean Master) might be able to delete locked media, so do not delete any relative files of Smart Lock while cleaning up your smartphone.
- Do not forget to unlock and back up locked medias before upgrading firmware or formatting internal/external SDcard If not, all locked medias might be able to be deleted.
- Before deleting Smart Lock, do not forget to unlock all locked medias and then delete Smart Lock. If not, all locked medias might be able to be deleted.
- Please back up important locked media in extra storage. All locked medias might be able to be deleted in other Apps or outbreak situation.
- App Hide : If "it is not installed application" or is not running in the launcher, because it is checked "App Hide Mode" at Set up. Please use dial #789 in your phone and press call.
- When not execute calling to dial : Run Gallery(Default) on the phone > Select and share photos > Select Smart Lock and lock > call to dial #789
- Settings of app > Recovering media file : it can recover disappeared or invisible locked media files.

play_store_details.title: LOCKLY®
play_store_details.description:
Enjoy the safe and keyless experience of your smart home now. Lock, unlock and monitor your door status by using your phones within Bluetooth range. Give keyless entry to your family members, friends, renters or visitors. 
The LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock App helps you control and share access to your home’s LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock.
With LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock app, you will never worry about key being stolen or lost.

Main Features:
• Unlock your LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock with our iOS and Android compatible app securely through Bluetooth; 
• Manage up to 8 sets (6 to 8 digits each) guests’ codes with expiring date for each of your LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock;
• Set up temperate access code anywhere in the world;
• Share codes with friends or guests via email, whatsapp or text;
• Configure the built-in alarm to beep when the door senses a slight disturbance such as opening and closing, or sound a loud alarm when a forced entry attempt is detected
• Access your history of Smart Lock to keep tracking the entry history
• View battery status and receive low battery notifications.
• Manage multiple homes with one App


Buy LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock now!

Official Website: www.lockly.com
Contact us: help@lockly.com

play_store_details.title: LOCKLY®
play_store_details.description:
Enjoy the safe and keyless experience of your smart home now. Lock, unlock and monitor your door status by using your phones within Bluetooth range. Give keyless entry to your family members, friends, renters or visitors. 
The LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock App helps you control and share access to your home’s LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock.
With LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock app, you will never worry about key being stolen or lost.

Main Features:
• Unlock your LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock with our iOS and Android compatible app securely through Bluetooth; 
• Manage up to 8 sets (6 to 8 digits each) guests’ codes with expiring date for each of your LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock;
• Set up temperate access code anywhere in the world;
• Share codes with friends or guests via email, whatsapp or text;
• Configure the built-in alarm to beep when the door senses a slight disturbance such as opening and closing, or sound a loud alarm when a forced entry attempt is detected
• Access your history of Smart Lock to keep tracking the entry history
• View battery status and receive low battery notifications.
• Manage multiple homes with one App


Buy LOCKLY® SECURE Smart Lock now!

Official Website: www.lockly.com
Contact us: help@lockly.com

play_store_details.title: Aqara Home
play_store_details.descriptionHTML:
Aqara Home is an app for smart home automation and control. With Aqara Home, you can:
1. control Aqara accessories anywhere and anytime where there is Internet access;
2. create homes and rooms and assign accessories to the rooms;
3. control your Aqara accessories and check the status of connected appliances. For example:
• adjust the brightness of lights and check the power consumption of home appliances;
• monitor the temperature, humidity and air pressure;
• detect water leak, and human movement.
4. create Automations to automate your home. For example:
• set a timer to turn on or off an appliance connected to a smart plug;
• use a Door and Window Sensor to trigger lights: turn on lights automatically when the door opens.
5. create Scenes to control multiple accessories. For example, add a Scene to turn on multiple lights and fans;
Aqara Home app supports following Aqara accessories: Aqara Hub, Smart Plug, Wireless Remote Switch, LED Light Bulb, Door and Window Sensor, Motion Sensor, Temperature and Humidity Sensor, Vibration Sensor, and Water Leak Sensor. This is not a complete list. Please see www.aqara.com for more details.

play_store_details.title: Kieslect
play_store_details.descriptionHTML:
Kieslect APP is the supporting application of "Kieslect ks" smartwatch, with the following functions:
1.One of the main functions of the APP is to push the incoming calls and SMS/MMS messages received by the mobile phone to the associated smart watch, so that you can answer and view the SMS/MMS on the watch side; when the watch side rejects the call, you can quickly reply, and the APP will send a pre-configured SMS to the caller at this time. It should be noted that the APP will request "SMS and Call Log Permissions" to implement these functions, without these permissions the application will not be able to use.
2.Record the heart rate data collected by the smart watch, and display it in the form of a line graph and a histogram according to the heart rate data;
3.Record the exercise data collected by the smart watch, including the number of steps, stride frequency and distance, and display them in the form of line graphs and histograms;
4.Record the sleep data collected by the smart watch, and display them in the form of line graphs and histograms;
5.Start a workout or fitness exercise with the watch;
5.Set reminders and alarms for your smart watch.

The data on the APP is not for medical use and is only applicable for general health/fitness purposes.
play_store_details.summary: Sports and health App

play_store_details.title: anyloop
play_store_details.description:
Combining anyloop with smartwatch or smart devices,users can track their health and fitness data.
Device Management
When synced to a smartphone via Bluetooth, smartwatch shows notifications of calls, SMS, emails, calendar events and social media activity. The following permissions are required for the App service. 
-Phone : Monitor the phone call information, get the call contact information and push it to the watch, so that you know who the caller is, and perform operations such as hanging up on the watch.
-Notifications : Used to provide you with timely information.
-SMS: Use the watch to reply to a rejected SMS when you receive an incoming call notification.
Exercise Health
Scientific exercise monitoring, for you to record every progress, multi-dimensional health management, to help you control the body changes at any time.
Easy to use
All anyloop products are universal, so you only need one app to get a complete picture of your health, and everything is under control.
Easy to understand
All results are clearly displayed, with normal ranges and color-coded alerts, so you know exactly where you stand.
Attention:
1. The app needs to have an external device (smartwatch or smart bracelet) to record blood oxygen levels, heart rate, etc. Supported devices include: ALB1, ALW1, ALW7, etc.
2. The charts, data, etc. in this app are for reference only. It can't give you professional health advice, not to mention that it can't replace professional doctors and instruments. If you think you have a health problem, please be sure to consult a professional doctor.

play_store_details.title: Kieslect
play_store_details.descriptionHTML:
Kieslect APP is the supporting application of "Kieslect ks" smartwatch, with the following functions:
1.One of the main functions of the APP is to push the incoming calls and SMS/MMS messages received by the mobile phone to the associated smart watch, so that you can answer and view the SMS/MMS on the watch side; when the watch side rejects the call, you can quickly reply, and the APP will send a pre-configured SMS to the caller at this time. It should be noted that the APP will request "SMS and Call Log Permissions" to implement these functions, without these permissions the application will not be able to use.
2.Record the heart rate data collected by the smart watch, and display it in the form of a line graph and a histogram according to the heart rate data;
3.Record the exercise data collected by the smart watch, including the number of steps, stride frequency and distance, and display them in the form of line graphs and histograms;
4.Record the sleep data collected by the smart watch, and display them in the form of line graphs and histograms;
5.Start a workout or fitness exercise with the watch;
5.Set reminders and alarms for your smart watch.

The data on the APP is not for medical use and is only applicable for general health/fitness purposes.

play_store_details.title: Blackview Smart Watch Guide
play_store_details.description:
If your looking for a smartwatch for less than $50 the Blackview ID205L  is one of the cheapest square smartwatches on the market. At such a bargain price, you’re probably wondering if it actually does what it claims and whether it’s worth investing in.
With this in mind, I purchased one to put it through its paces and I’m sharing my honest findings in this review.
Overall Verdict 
The Blackview smartwatch is a cheap and simple smartwatch. Starting with the positives, it’s very comfortable to wear on your wrist. This is because it’s slim and lightweight due to its plastic build.
The best part of the device is the activity tracking. It can keep an eye on your daily fitness goals such as steps, calories burned, and distance traveled. It can also mirror your phone notifications, however, beyond this it doesn’t have a lot of other truly useful features.
If you want something a little smarter but still doesn’t break the bank, the Amazfit Bip U is a great choice. It has more detailed sports tracking thanks to extra sensors and the inclusion of GPS for tracking your routes.

Blackview is a Chinese electronics brand that sells smartphones, tablets, watches, and accessories in over 60 countries across the world.
The brand was first popularised by its rugged smartphone but has since expanded to sell a variety of electronics at budget prices, usually through Amazon.

What’s In The Box

The Blackview arrived in a basic white branded box. Inside were:

The watch.
A clip-on magnetic charger.
Instruction manual.
The charger only had a USB connection so you’ll need to source a wall adaptor if you don’t already have one.

Design & Build Quality 
Starting with the design of the watch, it’s a square watch that looks very reminiscent of the Apple Watch from a distance. However, when you pick it up, you’ll immediately notice that it’s a lot lighter and made of plastic and you can tell it’s a cheap device.
Being lightweight and with a silicon rubber band, the watch is comfortable to wear, even when working out. You can also wear it whilst swimming or in the shower thanks to an IP68 waterproof rating which can withstand up to 1.5m of submersion in water.
The screen is 1.3” with a TFT touch screen display. The colors are vibrant and the resolution is well suited to the features of the watch. The display isn’t always-on but does come on whenever you lift your wrist so you can still use it as a regular watch for telling the time.
There’s a single button that acts as a back button or a home button when you hold it down. Given how simple the interface is and the fact that you cannot use the watch for messaging, one button seems adequate for navigation.

Features
The main features of the watch are fitness tracking and notification mirroring. I’ll come on to discuss both of these later in the article.
Aside from this, there are a few other utilities that came in useful from time to time such as the stopwatch and countdown timer. These are useful for simple tasks such as boiling an egg, however, you cannot set laps so you’ll still be reaching for your smartphone.
The watch also has basic media controls with play/pause/skip for songs playing on your phone. There’s no built-in music storage or third-party streaming apps so you cannot play music directly on the watch.
Unfortunately, I couldn’t get the alarm function to work on the Blackview and since it doesn’t mirror the alarm from your phone, I had no way of using the watch for a morning wake-up call.
With such few features, the user interface was simple to navigate and I could reach most screens within a few taps.

play_store_details.title: KOSPET FIT
play_store_details.description:
The App KOSPET FIT, a brand-new smartwatch helper independently developed by KOSPET, not only monitors your health data and physical activities, but enables you to download numerous official watch faces and keep you informed of KOSPET’s latest and upcoming events and services. 

【Exercise & Physical Activity Tracking】
Once your daily goals are set, the progress is tracked in real time. 
Records steps and calculates distance and calorie consumption. 
Supports up to 70 sports modes with GPS. 

【Health Monitoring】
Enables real-time detection of heart rate with personal settings. 
Enables sleep monitoring and analysis of sleep quality that can be shared. 

【Personal Settings】
Download multiple customized watch faces online
Settings on notifications of phone calls, SMS and SNS. 
Quick settings on sedentary reminder, alarm clock and tilt to wake the screen. 

【KOSPET Official Service】
Direct access to an update on KOSPET’s new arrivals.  
Direct access to KOSPET’s official technical support and after-sales service. 

【About App Permissions】
To ensure better product experience, KOSPET FIT will use the permissions to access your Bluetooth, location, phone calls, text messages, contacts, call history, and accessibility services, and the App will obtain the message push content through [Accessibility API], realize the message push function, and push the message content to the smart watch TANK M2 and TANK T2；
This aims for a faster and more convenient using experience of KOSPET FIT. KOSPET cannot view, upload or save any of your private information. 

Notes:
KOSPET FIT is currently compatible with KOSPET TANK T2 and TANK M2 and it is expected to ensure compatibility with more upcoming models. 
KOSPET FIT is not compatible with KOSPET TANK M1 series, TANK T1 series, MAGIC 3, MAGIC 3S, MAGIC 4, GTO or GTR.

To ensure better product experience, KOSPET FIT will use the permissions to access your Bluetooth, location, phone calls, text messages, contacts, call history, and accessibility services, and the App will obtain the message push content through [Accessibility API], realize the message push function, and push the message content to the smart watch TANK M2 and TANK T2；
This aims for a faster and more convenient using experience of KOSPET FIT. KOSPET cannot view, upload or save any of your private information.

Notes:
KOSPET FIT is currently compatible with KOSPET TANK T2 and TANK M2 and it is expected to ensure compatibility with more upcoming models.
KOSPET FIT is not compatible with KOSPET TANK M1 series, TANK T1 series, MAGIC 3, MAGIC 3S, MAGIC 4, GTO or GTR.
play_store_details.summary: KOSPET FIT is a supported application for smartwatch

play_store_details.title: anyloop
play_store_details.description:
Combining anyloop with smartwatch or smart devices,users can track their health and fitness data.
Device Management
When synced to a smartphone via Bluetooth, smartwatch shows notifications of calls, SMS, emails, calendar events and social media activity. The following permissions are required for the App service. 
-Phone : Monitor the phone call information, get the call contact information and push it to the watch, so that you know who the caller is, and perform operations such as hanging up on the watch.
-Notifications : Used to provide you with timely information.
-SMS: Use the watch to reply to a rejected SMS when you receive an incoming call notification.
Exercise Health
Scientific exercise monitoring, for you to record every progress, multi-dimensional health management, to help you control the body changes at any time.
Easy to use
All anyloop products are universal, so you only need one app to get a complete picture of your health, and everything is under control.
Easy to understand
All results are clearly displayed, with normal ranges and color-coded alerts, so you know exactly where you stand.
Attention:
1. The app needs to have an external device (smartwatch or smart bracelet) to record blood oxygen levels, heart rate, etc. Supported devices include: ALB1, ALW1, ALW7, etc.
2. The charts, data, etc. in this app are for reference only. It can't give you professional health advice, not to mention that it can't replace professional doctors and instruments. If you think you have a health problem, please be sure to consult a professional doctor.

play_store_details.title: Bp Doctor Plus
play_store_details.description:
Bp Doctor Plus can help you enjoy a healthier lifestyle and master your health data

Devices supported:
·BP Doctor PRO
·BP Doctor MED
·Other smart wearable devices

1.App manage watch data
App can synchronize watch data, help you record and manage health data.
2.Measure Health Data including, master your blood pressure/SpO2 data directly
The blood pressure/SpO2 data of the human body can be tested regularly every day, so that users can directly understand their own blood pressure/SpO2 status.
3.Sleep housekeeper
In-depth measurement of sleep data, show you the sleep quality.
4.Record exercise data
Data such as heart rate, blood oxygen, speed, etc. can be obtained for each exercise. The exercise is more scientific and the data recording is more accurate.
5.Personal reminders
Silent alarm clock vibrates to wake yourself up without disturbing the person next to the pillow;
Incoming call, SMS, Facebook, INS, WeChat, QQ and other personal reminders, don’t miss every important message

Disclaimer:
· Our app is not intended to be used as a medical device/product, it is for fitness/entertainment purposes only.
· If you need it for medical purposes, please consult your doctor or primary care physician.
· Our app is not intended for diagnosis of any disease or condition.
· Our app has not been tested/verified on all supported devices, use at your own risk.

play_store_details.title: Veepoo Health
play_store_details.description:
About this app
Get to a healthier and more active smart life with the  Veepoo Health!
Veepoo Healthwill help you to:
Track your workout/exercise from the smart watch named RIG
Get instant insights when you exercise and see real-time status for your runs, walks and cycle rides. Veepoo Health will use your smartwatch's heart rate sensors to record your speed, pace, route and more.
MONITOR YOUR GOALS
See your daily progress. Meeting your goals eachday Based on your activity and goal progress, Veepoo Health will help you adjust them so that you can keep challenging yourself to achieve a healthy heart and mind.
MAKE ALL YOUR MOVEMENT COUNT
lf you walk, run or cycle during the day, your smartwatch will automatically detect and add your activities to your Veepoo Health journal to ensure that you get recorded for every move. Enjoy a different type of workout? Select it from a list of activities such as climbing, Cycling, Indoor running, swimming, and Veepoo Health will track all the achievement that you earn.
lt can synchronize the pace of the sports ,heart rate, sleep, exercise and other data. You can push messages from various apps to your watch.You can set a variety of reminders for your watch.It synchronizes the health data of the watch device and shows the user a lot of health data records.
Call Alert Permission-Once enabled from application
user will get the call alert on his/her Watch. For achieving the same user need to grant Call read permission to app and receive/reject call.
SMS Alert Permission -Once enabled from application
user will get the SMS alert on his/her Watch.For achieving the same user need to grant SMS content display permission to application so that after reading the same from user device it get reflected on user watch.
Veepoo Health collects location data to enable["reconnect device"] ，even when the app is closed or not in use，

play_store_details.title: KOSPET FIT
play_store_details.description:
The App KOSPET FIT, a brand-new smartwatch helper independently developed by KOSPET, not only monitors your health data and physical activities, but enables you to download numerous official watch faces and keep you informed of KOSPET’s latest and upcoming events and services. 

【Exercise & Physical Activity Tracking】
Once your daily goals are set, the progress is tracked in real time. 
Records steps and calculates distance and calorie consumption. 
Supports up to 70 sports modes with GPS. 

【Health Monitoring】
Enables real-time detection of heart rate with personal settings. 
Enables sleep monitoring and analysis of sleep quality that can be shared. 

【Personal Settings】
Download multiple customized watch faces online
Settings on notifications of phone calls, SMS and SNS. 
Quick settings on sedentary reminder, alarm clock and tilt to wake the screen. 

【KOSPET Official Service】
Direct access to an update on KOSPET’s new arrivals.  
Direct access to KOSPET’s official technical support and after-sales service. 

【About App Permissions】
To ensure better product experience, KOSPET FIT will use the permissions to access your Bluetooth, location, phone calls, text messages, contacts, call history, and accessibility services, and the App will obtain the message push content through [Accessibility API], realize the message push function, and push the message content to the smart watch TANK M2 and TANK T2；
This aims for a faster and more convenient using experience of KOSPET FIT. KOSPET cannot view, upload or save any of your private information. 

Notes:
KOSPET FIT is currently compatible with KOSPET TANK T2 and TANK M2 and it is expected to ensure compatibility with more upcoming models. 
KOSPET FIT is not compatible with KOSPET TANK M1 series, TANK T1 series, MAGIC 3, MAGIC 3S, MAGIC 4, GTO or GTR.

play_store_details.title: anyloop
play_store_details.description:
Combining anyloop with smartwatch or smart devices,users can track their health and fitness data.
Device Management
When synced to a smartphone via Bluetooth, smartwatch shows notifications of calls, SMS, emails, calendar events and social media activity. The following permissions are required for the App service. 
-Phone : Monitor the phone call information, get the call contact information and push it to the watch, so that you know who the caller is, and perform operations such as hanging up on the watch.
-Notifications : Used to provide you with timely information.
-SMS: Use the watch to reply to a rejected SMS when you receive an incoming call notification.
Exercise Health
Scientific exercise monitoring, for you to record every progress, multi-dimensional health management, to help you control the body changes at any time.
Easy to use
All anyloop products are universal, so you only need one app to get a complete picture of your health, and everything is under control.
Easy to understand
All results are clearly displayed, with normal ranges and color-coded alerts, so you know exactly where you stand.
Attention:
1. The app needs to have an external device (smartwatch or smart bracelet) to record blood oxygen levels, heart rate, etc. Supported devices include: ALB1, ALW1, ALW7, etc.
2. The charts, data, etc. in this app are for reference only. It can't give you professional health advice, not to mention that it can't replace professional doctors and instruments. If you think you have a health problem, please be sure to consult a professional doctor.

play_store_details.title: Frontier X
play_store_details.description:
With your Frontier X/X2, track your ECG during any activity including exercise, rest or sleep to get detailed insights on heart health and exercise performance. This companion app allows you to connect with Frontier X2 - a revolutionary chest strap wearable smart heart monitor and view your recorded data. 

Trusted by world-class athletes across the globe, the Frontier X2 is a chest-worn Smart Heart Monitor that provides in-depth real-time feedback on your heart health. It can monitor your 

Heart Health
24/7 Continuous ECG
Heart Rate
Heart Rate Variability (HRV)
Breathing Rate
Strain
Rhythms
Training Load
Calories
Stress,  and a lot more.

● Accurately record continuous ECG for up to 24hrs during any activity like exercise, running, cycling, resting, sleeping, meditation, etc for comprehensive heart health insights.
●  Spot changes in your heart health with Rhythm and Strain.
● Train in the right zone without distractions with real-time, personalized, and discreet vibration alerts. 
● Add health event tags to help you understand how lifestyle choices and behavior affect your health. 
● Generate PDF reports of your ECG and securely share it, along with other health metrics, with anyone worldwide.
● Seamlessly integrate with Bluetooth-enabled wearables and third-party devices such as GPS sports watches, bike computers, and more.
● AI-enabled algorithms - Receive post-activity training insights, recommendations, and weekly goals. 

Now get deeper insights and data with Frontier Premium Subscription*:


Metabolic Profile Analytics: Track training intensity and the impact of lifestyle changes on metabolic health with key metrics like VO2 Max, VO2 Zones, Oxygen Uptake, and Ventilatory Thresholds (VTs). 

VO2 Max: Get the most accurate real-time VOo2 Max data. While other wearables estimate using motion and heart rate, our continuous ECG provides precise VOo2 Max readings outside of a lab, tracking cardiovascular efficiency and endurance potential. Unlike wrist-based devices, our 24/7 ECG-based system consistently captures your heart's electrical signals, offering reliable data.

Readiness Score: Determine if your body is ready for peak performance or needs recovery. Advanced algorithms use heart rate, heart rate variability (HRV), and ECG data to guide your daily activities and training.

Sleep Stage Analysis: Get a comprehensive understanding of your sleep quality. Our system uses continuous ECG to track heart patterns and sleep stages.

With Frontier's Premium subscription and Metabolic Profile Analysis, tracking your VO₂ max becomes simpler and more precise. 


About Fourth Frontier
Fourth Frontier is an innovative health-tech company focused on revolutionizing heart health monitoring with its cutting-edge wearable ECG technology. 

We are the World’s First Smart Heart Monitor. With over 5 billion heartbeats recorded from 120,000+ users across  50+ countries, we are empowering users to understand and manage their heart health in real-time. 

These features make the Frontier App a comprehensive tool for heart health management and fitness improvement.

Download the app today and access the most accurate heart health data available.
Apps available for iOS, Android, and Apple Watch.


*A Paid Frontier Premium subscription is required to access the full feature set .

play_store_details.title: LEDVANCE SMART+
play_store_details.description:
Do you want smart lighting that switches on magically or more security with just one click? With the new LEDVANCE SMART+ app, that’s no problem at all! 
The new app has the advantage of combining all previous functions in a single application. Of course, we understand that switching to a new app can be annoying, but we promise: handling your smart lights is even easier with LEDVANCE SMART+ from now!
To show you what to expect, we have summarized the smart features for you below:
Flexible lighting
A flexible lighting mode allows you to adjust brightness, color temperature or even the colors of your smart lights according to your respective needs. You can set different moods thanks to pre-installed light scenes but an individual modification is also possible.
Schedules & Automations
With the help of the new LEDVANCE SMART+ app, you can set up different schedules and automations: You are watching TV at the same time every day and want to switch off the ceiling light to do so? No problem! Once set, your smart devices will automatically repeat this action every day by themselves.
Smart lighting for your daily routine & circadian rhythm
Whether waking up in the morning or going to bed in the evening – with some of the LEDVANCE products you can easily define a sunrise alarm with fade-in or fade-out lighting via app. Also super helpful: Light similar to natural daylight can help improve physical well-being. Based on this scientific finding, you can adjust the light color and brightness of certain luminaires to your individual daily routine - for calmer sleep and a better mood.
Adaptation to light conditions
If the sun is shining, you usually need little to no additional light. If it is cloudy, on the other hand, artificial light is needed to brighten up the room. By linking to weather information, your lighting independently adjusts to the current natural lighting conditions.
Integration with other smart home systems
Do you already use Google Home, Samsung SmartThings, Home Connect Plus or Amazon Alexa? The combination of the LEDVANCE SMART+ app with these systems offers you additional features for many end devices - for example, voice control. The app even supports 28 languages here.
Grouping lamps
With the new LEDVANCE app, it is possible to organize several lamps into groups and control them simultaneously. For example, you can set all your outdoor lights to turn on together.
Power consumption 
If you use WiFi sockets for your smart lighting or other devices, you can view the energy consumption at any time with the help of our app – that's good for the environment and your wallet!
Solar lights control
Solar lights usually turn on by themselves. However, our smart solar products can also be conveniently controlled using the new SMART+ app.
Camera and sensor control
Do you use smart outdoor lights with integrated cameras or sensors? Thanks to the LEDVANCE SMART+ app, you'll receive live images and notifications when your lights detect movement.
Integration of non-smart devices into the system
You want to control a non-smart light via our app? Thanks to the SMART+ Plug, even conventional lights and devices can be integrated into your smart home system and controlled via the LEDVANCE SMART+ app.
Note: Please note that some functions of the app only work with WiFi or Bluetooth devices. Zigbee devices are not compatible with this app.
As you can see, the new LEDVANCE SMART+ app offers many functions around smart lighting and beyond. The future belongs to smart home systems. LEDVANCE therefore offers you a wide range of smart lighting solutions for indoors and outdoors to pair with the app. These solutions are not only extremely efficient, but also visually appealing . Whether smart ceiling lights, LED lamps or LED strips –  at LEDVANCE SMART+ you will surely find what you are looking for.

play_store_details.title: Amazon Alexa
play_store_details.description:
Use the Amazon Alexa App to set up your Alexa-enabled devices, listen to music, create shopping lists, get news updates, and much more. The more you use Alexa, the more she adapts to your voice, vocabulary, and personal preferences.

DISCOVER MORE
• Get more out of your Echo device through personalized feature recommendations from Alexa
• Discover and enable recommended Alexa skills
• Pick up where you left off directly from the home feed with lists, shopping, or recently played Music and Books

MANAGE YOUR DEVICES
• Set up your Alexa-enabled devices, control or check status of your compatible smart lights, locks and thermostats at home or on the go
• Create routines to automate your smart home devices

MUSIC & BOOKS
• Connect to music services like Amazon Music, Pandora, Spotify, TuneIn, and iHeartRadio. Choose a song or playlist and listen on your Alexa-enabled devices
• Create speaker groups to play music across your compatible Echo devices for multi-room music

ORGANIZE YOUR DAY
• View and edit shopping and to-do lists on the go, get weather and news updates, manage timers and alarms, and more

STAY CONNECTED
• Use Drop In from your app to connect instantly with your compatible Echo devices, like a two-way intercom 
• Call or message supported Alexa-enabled devices, at no additional cost
